name: Spree Commerce Demo
description: Spree is a is a open-source e-commerce platform for Rails. It is a great starting point for any Rails developer to quickly build an e-commerce store.

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: Email address for the admin user (REQUIRED - must be unique and valid)

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Secure password for the admin user (REQUIRED - minimum 6 characters)

APP_HOST.description: Your application domain without protocol (e.g., mystore.com or shop.example.com). REQUIRED to prevent localhost URLs in production.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
